CustomField.description: Amount of points needed per dollar cost. For example, 0.2 means 5 points = $1. Default of 0.01 means 100 points = $1.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Amount of points needed per dollar cost. For example, 0.2 means 5 points = $1. Default of 0.01 means 100 points = $1.
CustomField.label: B2B Reward Points Cost Multiplier
